KEY_TO_BYTE_PS.desc: Set bitness to 8 bits (byte), preserve sign

KEY_TO_WORD_PS.desc: Set bitness to 16 bits (word), preserve sign

KEY_TO_DWORD_PS.desc: Set bitness to 32 bits (dword), preserve sign

KEY_TO_QWORD_PS.desc: Set bitness to 64 bits (qword), preserve sign

KEY_ENTER.desc: Perform entered arithmetical or logical operation

KEY_CLEAR.desc: Set the main and input registers to zero, clear the entered operation

KEY_EXT_CLEAR.desc: Set the extension register to zero

KEY_COPY_EXT2NUM.desc: Copy the extension register to the main register

KEY_LOGARITHM.desc: Toggle bit count and log2 view
